alert.note: Alert for Sevier (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 06 at 2:43PM CDT until September 06 at 3:30PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Sevier County in southwestern Arkansas... * Until 330 PM CDT. * At 243 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near De Queen, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... De Queen, Horatio, Lockesburg, Gillham, Geneva, and West Otis. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
